import colors from'assets/theme-dark/base/colors';// Material Dashboard 2 React helper functions
import pxToRem from'assets/theme-dark/functions/pxToRem';import boxShadow from'assets/theme-dark/functions/boxShadow';var white=colors.white;var stepIcon={styleOverrides:{root:{background:'#9fc9ff',fill:'#9fc9ff',stroke:'#9fc9ff',strokeWidth:pxToRem(10),width:pxToRem(13),height:pxToRem(13),borderRadius:'50%',zIndex:99,transition:'all 200ms linear','&.Mui-active':{background:white.main,fill:white.main,stroke:white.main,borderColor:white.main,boxShadow:boxShadow([0,0],[0,2],white.main,1)},'&.Mui-completed':{background:white.main,fill:white.main,stroke:white.main,borderColor:white.main,boxShadow:boxShadow([0,0],[0,2],white.main,1)}}}};export default stepIcon;
